name: Aviation Globe Masters Academy (AGMA)
about: Aviation Globe Masters Academy (AGMA) is a premier flight school dedicated to providing top-notch aviation training. Located in a region with ideal flying conditions, AGMA offers a diverse fleet of single and multi-engine aircraft, as well as advanced full motion simulators. Our team of experienced Certified Flight Instructors is committed to delivering personalized, high-quality training tailored to each student's needs. As an FAA-approved Part 141 flight school, AGMA ensures compliance with national and international industry standards, prioritizing safety and excellence. Join AGMA to embark on a comprehensive and engaging flight training journey, empowering you to achieve your aviation dreams.
